Description: Dish. Made of blue, black underglaze pottery.
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (fig.84)
Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.72.B)
Canby 1999 / The Golden Age of Persian Art 1501-1722 (fig.162)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2007-2008 5 Oct-7 Jan, Paris, Musée du Louvre, 'The Song of the World: The Art of Safavid Iran 1501-1736'
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
